original_text: All the men from thirty to fifty years of age who came to serve in the work at the tent of meeting,
korean_text: 삼십 세부터 오십 세까지 회막에서 복무하고 봉사할 모든 자라

sentences.original_text: All the men from thirty to fifty years of age
sentences.korean_translation: 삼십 세에서 오십 세까지의 모든 남자는

sentences.original_text: who came to serve in the work
